OOPSRequest.OntologyContent:
<?xml version="1.0"?> <rdf:RDF xmlns="http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#" xml:base="http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl" xmlns:geo="http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#" xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#" xmlns:owl="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#" xmlns:xml="http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#" xmlns:rdfs="http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#" xmlns:time="http://www.w3.org/2006/time#" xmlns:event="http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#" xmlns:vs="http://www.w3.org/2003/06/sw-vocab-status/ns#" xmlns:foaf="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/" xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/"> <owl:Ontology rdf:about="http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl"> <owl:imports rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2006/time"/> <owl:versionInfo>Revision: 1.01</owl:versionInfo> <rdfs:label>The Event ontology</rdfs:label> </owl:Ontology>
<!-- /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// // // Annotation properties // /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// -->
<!-- http://www.w3.org/2003/06/sw-vocab-status/ns#term_status -->
<owl:AnnotationProperty rdf:about="http://www.w3.org/2003/06/sw-vocab-status/ns#term_status"/>
<!-- /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// // // Object Properties // /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// -->
<!-- http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#agent -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#agent"> <owl:equivalentProperty rdf:resource="http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#hasAgent"/> <owl:inverseOf rdf:resource="http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#agent_in"/> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#Event"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Agent"/> <rdfs:comment> Relates an event to an active agent (a person, a computer, ... :-) ) </rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label>agent</rdfs:label> <vs:term_status>stable</vs:term_status> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#agent_in -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#agent_in"> <owl:equivalentProperty rdf:resource="http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#isAgentIn"/> <vs:term_status>stable</vs:term_status> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#factor -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#factor"> <owl:equivalentProperty rdf:resource="http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#hasFactor"/> <owl:inverseOf rdf:resource="http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#factor_of"/> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#Event"/> <rdfs:comment> Relates an event to a passive factor (a tool, an instrument, an abstract cause...) </rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label>factor</rdfs:label> <vs:term_status>stable</vs:term_status> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#factor_of -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#factor_of"> <owl:equivalentProperty rdf:resource="http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#isFactorOf"/> <vs:term_status>stable</vs:term_status> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#hasAgent -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#hasAgent"> <vs:term_status>deprecated</vs:term_status> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#hasFactor -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#hasFactor"> <vs:term_status>deprecated</vs:term_status> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#hasProduct -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#hasProduct"> <owl:equivalentProperty rdf:resource="http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#product"/> <vs:term_status>deprecated</vs:term_status> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#hasSubEvent -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#hasSubEvent"> <owl:equivalentProperty rdf:resource="http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#sub_event"/> <vs:term_status>deprecated</vs:term_status> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#isAgentIn -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#isAgentIn"> <rdfs:label>agent in</rdfs:label> <vs:term_status>deprecated</vs:term_status> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#isFactorOf -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#isFactorOf"> <rdfs:label>factor of</rdfs:label> <vs:term_status>deprecated</vs:term_status> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#place -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#place"> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#Event"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#SpatialThing"/> <rdfs:comment> Relates an event to a spatial object. </rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label>place</rdfs:label> <vs:term_status>stable</vs:term_status> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#producedIn -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#producedIn"> <owl:equivalentProperty rdf:resource="http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#produced_in"/> <rdfs:label>produced in</rdfs:label> <vs:term_status>deprecated</vs:term_status> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#produced_in -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#produced_in"> <owl:inverseOf rdf:resource="http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#product"/> <vs:term_status>stable</vs:term_status> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#product -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#product"> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#Event"/> <rdfs:comment> Relates an event to something produced during the event---a sound, a pie, whatever... </rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label>product</rdfs:label> <vs:term_status>stable</vs:term_status> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#sub_event -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#sub_event"> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#Event"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#Event"/> <rdfs:comment> This property provides a way to split a complex event (for example, a performance involving several musicians) into simpler ones (one event per musician). </rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label>sub-event</rdfs:label> <vs:term_status>stable</vs:term_status> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#time -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#time"> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#Event"/> <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2006/time#TemporalEntity"/> <rdfs:comment> Relates an event to a time object, classifying a time region (either instantaneous or having an extent). By using the Timeline ontology here, you can define event happening on a recorded track or on any media with a temporal extent. </rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label>time</rdfs:label> <vs:term_status>stable</vs:term_status> </owl:ObjectProperty>
<!-- http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/maker -->
<owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/maker"/>
<!-- /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// // // Data properties // /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// -->
<!-- http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#hasLiteralFactor -->
<owl:DatatypeProperty rdf:about="http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#hasLiteralFactor"> <owl:equivalentProperty rdf:resource="http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#literal_factor"/> <vs:term_status>deprecated</vs:term_status> </owl:DatatypeProperty>
<!-- http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#literal_factor -->
<owl:DatatypeProperty rdf:about="http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#literal_factor"> <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#Event"/> <rdfs:comment> Relates an event to a factor which can be described as a literal. This property should not be used as-is, but should be subsumed by other, more specific, properties (like an hypothetic :weatherCelsius, linking an event to a temperature). </rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label>literal factor</rdfs:label> <vs:term_status>stable</vs:term_status> </owl:DatatypeProperty>
<!-- http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/date -->
<owl:DatatypeProperty rdf:about="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/date"/>
<!-- http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/description -->
<owl:DatatypeProperty rdf:about="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/description"/>
<!-- http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/title -->
<owl:DatatypeProperty rdf:about="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/title"/>
<!-- /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// // // Classes // /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// -->
<!-- http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#Event -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#Event"> <rdfs:comment> An arbitrary classification of a space/time region, by a cognitive agent. An event may have actively participating agents, passive factors, products, and a location in space/time. </rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label>Event</rdfs:label> <vs:term_status>stable</vs:term_status> </owl:Class>
<!-- http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#Factor -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#Factor"> <owl:equivalentClass> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#factor_of"/> <owl:someValuesFrom rdf:resource="http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#Event"/> </owl:Restriction> </owl:equivalentClass> <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Agent"/> <rdfs:comment> Everything used as a factor in an event </rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label>Factor</rdfs:label> <vs:term_status>stable</vs:term_status> </owl:Class>
<!-- http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#Product -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#Product"> <owl:equivalentClass> <owl:Restriction> <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#produced_in"/> <owl:someValuesFrom rdf:resource="http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl#Event"/> </owl:Restriction> </owl:equivalentClass> <rdfs:comment> Everything produced by an event </rdfs:comment> <rdfs:label>Product</rdfs:label> <vs:term_status>stable</vs:term_status> </owl:Class>
<!-- http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#SpatialThing -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#SpatialThing"/>
<!-- http://www.w3.org/2006/time#TemporalEntity -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="http://www.w3.org/2006/time#TemporalEntity"/>
<!-- http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Agent -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Agent"/>
<!-- http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Person -->
<owl:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Person"/>
<!-- /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// // // Individuals // /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// -->
<!-- http://moustaki.org/foaf.rdf#moustaki -->
<owl:NamedIndividual rdf:about="http://moustaki.org/foaf.rdf#moustaki"> <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Person"/> </owl:NamedIndividual>
<!-- http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl -->
<owl:Thing rdf:about="http://purl.org/NET/c4dm/event.owl"> <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#NamedIndividual"/> <foaf:maker rdf:resource="http://moustaki.org/foaf.rdf#moustaki"/> <dc:date>$Date: 2007/06/29 15:25:11 $</dc:date> <dc:description> This ontology deals with the notion of reified events--- events seen as first-class objects. It only defines one concept: Event, which may have agents (actively participating), factors (passively participating), products, and a location in space and time.
Regarding the ontological status of event tokens, they are seen as the way cognitive agents classify space/time regions </dc:description> <dc:title>The Event ontology</dc:title> </owl:Thing> </rdf:RDF>
<!-- Generated by the OWL API (version 4.2.6.20160910-2108) https://github.com/owlcs/owlapi -->
